He was replaced by Hilltop Hoods. * MorMor withdrew from the lineup due to unspecified reasons. He was replaced with Spacey Jane. ===2021=== The 2020 festival was originally scheduled for 24-26 July but was postponed to 23-25 October that same year, and then postponed again to 23-25 July 2021 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. On 13 July 2020 the organisers announced that Gorillaz would be replacing Flume as the headliner for Friday 23 July 2021, while The Strokes and Tyler, The Creator would be appearing as previously scheduled. 23 July 2021 * Gorillaz (UK) 24 July 2021 * The Strokes (USA) 25 July 2021 * Tyler, The Creator (USA) The line-up that had been announced for the 2020 festival is below; the organisers of the festival have stated their intention to re-book as many of these artists as possible. 24 July 2020 * ~~Flume~~ * Yeah Yeah Yeahs (USA) * Midnight Oil * King Krule (UK) *Dillon Francis (USA) *DMA's *Ruel *Cub Sport *Petit Biscuit (FRA) *Illy *Julia Jacklin *Baker Boy *Confidence Man *Sofi Tukker (USA) *Wallows (USA) *Bruno Major (UK) *Rolling Blackouts Coastal Fever *Hooligan Hefs *Inhaler (IRL) *Gryffin (USA) *Fazerdaze (NZ) *George Alice *Dena Amy *Luen *Aywy *Still Woozy (USA) *Joy Crookes (UK) *Muna (USA) *Sly Withers *Mako Road (NZ) *100 *Miss June (NZ) *Miiesha 25 July 2020 *The Strokes (USA) *Glass Animals (UK) *Violent Soho *Dom Dolla *Tim Minchin *King Princess (USA) *JPEGMafia (USA) *The Jungle Giants *Oliver Tree (USA) *Thelma Plum *Methyl Ethel *Mall Grab *Grouplove (USA) *The Chats *Chillinit *Stella Donnelly *Triple One *Kllo *PUP (CAN) *Shaed (USA) *Alice Ivy *Adrian Eagle *The Big Moon (UK) *The Lazy Eyes *Jordan Brando *Moktar *Carolina Gasolina *Kllo *Mildlife *Jarreau Vandal (NL) *Greentea Peng (UK) *Brame & Hamo (IRL) *Banoffee *Stevan *Dro Carey *DJ Scorpion *Lex Deluxe *Pink Matter *Memphis LK 26 July 2020 *Tyler, the Creator (USA) *Denzel Curry (USA) *Duke Dumont (UK) *Mura Masa (UK) *Idles (UK) *Sampa the Great *Grinspoon *Gerry Cinnamon (UK) *G Flip *Jack Garratt (UK) *Lime Cordiale *Tierra Whack (USA) *Julia Stone *Jack River *Benee (NZ) *Northeast Party House *Alex the Astronaut *Surfaces (USA) *Georgia (UK) *Mo'Ju *Mickey Kojak *Cry Club *Shantan Wantan Ichiban *Ak Sports *Sauti Systems *Bad//Dreems *Shannon & The Clams (USA) *Babe Rainbow perform The Velvet Underground's Loaded *Starcrawler (USA) *The Soul Movers *Lillie Mae (USA) *Andy Golledge *Charlie Collins == References == Category:Music festivals in Australia
